original_text: All the days wherein the plague shall be in him he shall be defiled; he is unclean: he shall dwell alone; without the camp shall his habitation be.
korean_text: 병 있는 날 동안은 늘 부정할 것이라 그가 부정한즉 혼자 살되 진영 밖에서 살지니라

sentences.original_text: All the days wherein the plague shall be in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 전염병이 있는 모든 날 동안

sentences.original_text: without the camp shall his habitation be
sentences.korean_translation: 진지 밖에 그의 거처가 있을 것이다
